sourcesContent:
/** @jsx jsx */
import { css, jsx } from '@emotion/react';
import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap';
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';

const BillDetailsModal = ({ showModal, handleClose, selectedBill }) => {
    return (
        <Modal show={showModal} onHide={handleClose}>
            <Modal.Header closeButton>
                <Modal.Title>Chi tiết Hóa Đơn</Modal.Title>
            </Modal.Header>
            <Modal.Body>
                {selectedBill && (
                    <Form>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formBillId">
                            <Form.Label>ID</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.id}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formGuestName">
                            <Form.Label>Tên khách hàng</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.reservation.guest.name}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formCheckinDate">
                            <Form.Label>Ngày check-in</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.reservation.checkin}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formCheckoutDate">
                            <Form.Label>Ngày check-out</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.reservation.checkout}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formTotalAmount">
                            <Form.Label>Tổng tiền</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.totalAmount}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                        <Form.Group controlId="formSummary">
                            <Form.Label>Tổng tiền bằng chữ</Form.Label>
                            <Form.Control
                                type="text"
                                value={selectedBill.summary}
                                readOnly
                            />
                        </Form.Group>
                    </Form>
                )}
            </Modal.Body>
            <Modal.Footer>
                <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleClose}>Đóng</Button>
            </Modal.Footer>
        </Modal>
    );
};

export default BillDetailsModal;
